title: Grape
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Grape |cost=? |weight=0.2 }} {{flavour|A small fruit.}} A '''grape''' is a fruit which normally provides a measly 100 [[nutrition]]. They are lightweight and always found in stacks of 10 or more, making them ideal for [[Fedhas]]' abilities. '''Carnivore'''
Rank 1: 80.
Rank 2: 60.
Rank 3: 0. '''Herbivore'''
Rank 1: 120.
Rank 2. 140.
Rank 3. 160. ==History== In [[0.15]], all fruits and vegetables were condensed into the universal "[[fruit]]" item. [[Category:Comestible]]
